item.title: What I'm Doing Now
item.description: Updated 2023-02-19. Complete Beginner on Try Hack Me Having completed both The Cyber Mentor’s Linux 101 and Ropper’s Computing Fundamentals courses I’m now following the Complete Beginner path on try Hack Me. Fire and Bones Been seeing a lot of traumas lately while on duty at the firehouse. Which means there’s a lot of sights, images, sounds, and smells flashing across my mental movie screen. Have some time-off lined up so I’ll head out of town for a spell.
